item.text: (3:31) King Nebuchadnezzar, to all peoples, nations, and language groups that live in all the land: “Peace and prosperity!
I am delighted to tell you about the signs and wonders that the most high God has done for me.

“How great are his signs!

How mighty are his wonders!

His kingdom will last forever,

and his authority continues from one generation to the next.”
(4:1) I, Nebuchadnezzar, was relaxing in my home, living luxuriously in my palace.

I <st data-num="02370" class="">saw</st> a <st data-num="02493" class="">dream</st> that<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01763" class="">frightened</st> me <st data-num="01763" class="">badly</st>. The <st data-num="02031" class="">things</st> I <st data-num="02031" class="">imagined</st> while lying <st data-num="05922" class="">on</st> my <st data-num="04903" class="">bed</st>—these <st data-num="02376" class="">visions</st> of my <st data-num="07217" class="">mind</st>—were <st data-num="0927" class="">terrifying</st> me.

<st data-num="04481">So</st> I <st data-num="07761" class="">issued</st> an <st data-num="02942" class="">order</st><n id="1" /> for <st data-num="03606" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02445" class="">wise men</st> of <st data-num="0895" class="">Babylon</st> to be <st data-num="05954" class="">brought</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="06925" class="">before</st> me <st data-num="01768" class="">so that</st> they could <st data-num="03046">make known</st> to me the <st data-num="06591" class="">interpretation</st> of the <st data-num="02493" class="">dream</st>.

<st data-num="0116" class="">When</st> the <st data-num="02749" class="">magicians</st>, <st data-num="0826" class="">astrologers</st>, <st data-num="03779" class="">wise men</st>, and <st data-num="01505" class="">diviners</st> <st data-num="05954" class="">entered</st>, <st data-num="0576" class="">I</st> <st data-num="0560" class="">recounted</st> the <st data-num="02493" class="">dream</st> <st data-num="06925" class="">for</st> them. But they were <st data-num="03809" class="">unable</st> to <st data-num="03046">make known</st> its <st data-num="06591" class="">interpretation</st> to me.

<st data-num="05705 0318">Later</st> <st data-num="01841" class="">Daniel</st> <st data-num="05954 06925">entered</st> (<st data-num="01768" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="08036" class="">name</st> is <st data-num="01096" class="">Belteshazzar</st> after the <st data-num="08036" class="">name</st> of my <st data-num="0426" class="">god</st>,<n id="1" /> and in <st data-num="01768" class="">whom</st> there is a <st data-num="07308" class="">spirit</st> of the <st data-num="06922" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="0426" class="">gods</st>). I <st data-num="0560" class="">recounted</st> the <st data-num="02493" class="">dream</st> <st data-num="06925" class="">for</st> him as well,

saying, “<st data-num="01096" class="">Belteshazzar</st>, <st data-num="07229" class="">chief</st> of the <st data-num="02749" class="">magicians</st>, in <st data-num="01768" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="0576" class="">I</st> <st data-num="03046" class="">know</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">there</st> to be a <st data-num="07308" class="">spirit</st> of the <st data-num="06922" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="0426" class="">gods</st> and whom <st data-num="03606 03809">no</st> <st data-num="07328" class="">mystery</st> <st data-num="0598" class="">baffles</st>, <st data-num="02370" class="">consider</st><n id="1" /> my <st data-num="02493" class="">dream</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="02370" class="">saw</st> and <st data-num="0560" class="">set forth</st> its <st data-num="06591" class="">interpretation</st>!

Here are the visions of my mind while I was on my bed.

“While I was watching,

there was a tree in the middle of the land.

It was enormously tall.

The tree grew large and strong.

Its top reached far into the sky;

it could be seen from the borders of all the land.

Its foliage was attractive and its fruit plentiful;

on it there was food enough for all.

Under it the wild animals used to seek shade,

and in its branches the birds of the sky used to nest.

All creatures used to feed themselves from it.

“While I was watching in my mind’s visions on my bed,

a holy sentinel came down from heaven.

He called out loudly as follows:

‘Chop down the tree and lop off its branches!

Strip off its foliage

and scatter its fruit!

Let the animals flee from under it

and the birds from its branches.

But leave its taproot in the ground,

with a band of iron and bronze around it

surrounded by the grass of the field.

Let it become damp with the dew of the sky,

and let it live with the animals in the grass of the land.

Let his mind be altered from that of a human being,

and let an animal’s mind be given to him,

and let seven periods of time go by for him.

This announcement is by the decree of the sentinels;

this decision is by the pronouncement of the holy ones,

so that those who are alive may understand

that the Most High has authority over human kingdoms,

and he bestows them on whomever he wishes.

He establishes over them even the lowliest of human beings.’

“This is the dream that I, King Nebuchadnezzar, saw. Now you, Belteshazzar, declare its interpretation, for none of the wise men in my kingdom are able to make known to me the interpretation. But you can do so, for a spirit of the holy gods is in you.”

Then Daniel (whose name is also Belteshazzar) was upset for a brief time; his thoughts were alarming him. The king said, “Belteshazzar, don’t let the dream and its interpretation alarm you.” But Belteshazzar replied, “Sir, if only the dream were for your enemies and its interpretation applied to your adversaries!

The <st data-num="0363" class="">tree</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="02370" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> <st data-num="07236 08631">grew</st> <st data-num="07236" class="">large</st> and <st data-num="08631" class="">strong</st>, whose <st data-num="07314" class="">top</st> <st data-num="04291" class="">reached</st> to the <st data-num="08065" class="">sky</st>, and that could be <st data-num="02379" class="">seen</st><n id="1" /> in <st data-num="03606" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0772" class="">land</st>,

whose <st data-num="06074" class="">foliage</st> was <st data-num="08209" class="">attractive</st> and its <st data-num="04" class="">fruit</st> <st data-num="07690" class="">plentiful</st>, and from which there was <st data-num="04203" class="">food</st> available for <st data-num="03606" class="">all</st>, <st data-num="08460" class="">under</st> whose branches <st data-num="01251" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="02423" class="">animals</st><n id="1" /> used to <st data-num="01753" class="">live</st>, and in whose <st data-num="06056" class="">branches</st> <st data-num="06853" class="">birds</st> of the <st data-num="08065" class="">sky</st> used to <st data-num="07932" class="">nest</st>—

<st data-num="01932" class="">it</st> is <st data-num="0607" class="">you</st>,<n id="1" /> O <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st>! <st data-num="01768" class="">For</st> you have <st data-num="07236 08631">become</st> <st data-num="07236" class="">great</st> and <st data-num="08631" class="">strong</st>. Your <st data-num="07238" class="">greatness</st> <st data-num="07236" class="">is such</st> that it <st data-num="04291" class="">reaches</st> to <st data-num="08065" class="">heaven</st> and your <st data-num="07985" class="">authority</st> to the <st data-num="05491" class="">ends</st> of the <st data-num="0772" class="">earth</st>.

<st data-num="01768" class="">As for</st> the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> <st data-num="02370" class="">seeing</st> a <st data-num="06922" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="05894" class="">sentinel</st> <st data-num="05182" class="">coming down</st> <st data-num="04481" class="">from</st> <st data-num="08065" class="">heaven</st> and <st data-num="0560" class="">saying</st>, ‘<st data-num="01414" class="">Chop down</st> the <st data-num="0363" class="">tree</st> and <st data-num="02255" class="">destroy</st> it, <st data-num="01297" class="">but</st> <st data-num="07662" class="">leave</st> its <st data-num="06136 08330">taproot</st> in the <st data-num="0772" class="">ground</st>, with a <st data-num="0613" class="">band</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> <st data-num="06523" class="">iron</st> and <st data-num="05174" class="">bronze</st> around it, surrounded by the <st data-num="01883" class="">grass</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="01251" class="">field</st>. Let it <st data-num="06647" class="">become damp</st> with the <st data-num="02920" class="">dew</st> of the <st data-num="08065" class="">sky</st>, and let it <st data-num="02508" class="">live</st> <st data-num="05974" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="01251" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="02423" class="">animals</st>, <st data-num="05705 01768">until</st> <st data-num="07655" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="05732" class="">periods of time</st> <st data-num="02499" class="">go by</st> <st data-num="05922" class="">for</st> him’—

<st data-num="01836" class="">this</st> is the <st data-num="06591" class="">interpretation</st>, O <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st>. <st data-num="01932" class="">It</st> is the <st data-num="01510" class="">decision</st> of the <st data-num="05943" class="">Most High</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> this has <st data-num="04291" class="">happened</st> <st data-num="05922" class="">to</st> my <st data-num="04756" class="">lord</st> the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st>.

You will be <st data-num="02957" class="">driven</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04481" class="">from</st> <st data-num="0606" class="">human society</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="04070" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="01934" class="">live</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="05974" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="01251" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="02423" class="">animals</st>. You will be <st data-num="02939" class="">fed</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="06211" class="">grass</st> like <st data-num="08450" class="">oxen</st>,<n id="5" /> and you will <st data-num="06647" class="">become damp</st> with the <st data-num="02920" class="">dew</st> of the <st data-num="08065" class="">sky</st>. <st data-num="07655" class="">Seven</st> <st data-num="05732" class="">periods of time</st> will <st data-num="02499" class="">pass by</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> you <st data-num="05705 01768">before</st><n id="6" /> you <st data-num="03046" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="05943" class="">Most High</st> is <st data-num="07990" class="">ruler</st> over <st data-num="0606" class="">human</st> <st data-num="04437" class="">kingdoms</st> and <st data-num="05415" class="">gives</st> them to <st data-num="04479 01768">whomever</st> he <st data-num="06634" class="">wishes</st>.

They <st data-num="0560" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="07662" class="">leave</st> the <st data-num="06136 08330">taproot</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="0363" class="">tree</st>, <st data-num="01768" class="">for</st> your <st data-num="04437" class="">kingdom</st> will be <st data-num="07011" class="">restored</st> to you <st data-num="04481 01768">when</st> you <st data-num="03046" class="">come to understand</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> <st data-num="08065" class="">heaven</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07990" class="">rules</st>.

Therefore, O king, may my advice be pleasing to you. Break away from your sins by doing what is right, and from your iniquities by showing mercy to the poor. Perhaps your prosperity will be prolonged.”
Now all this happened to King Nebuchadnezzar.

<st data-num="07118" class="">After</st> <st data-num="08648 06236">12</st> <st data-num="03393" class="">months</st>, he <st data-num="01934" class="">happened to be</st> <st data-num="01981" class="">walking around</st> <st data-num="05922" class="">on</st> the battlements<n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="04437" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="01965" class="">palace</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> <st data-num="0895" class="">Babylon</st>.

The <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> <st data-num="06032 0560">uttered these words</st>: “Is <st data-num="01668 01932">this</st> <st data-num="03809" class="">not</st> the <st data-num="07229" class="">great</st> <st data-num="0895" class="">Babylon</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0576" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="01124" class="">built</st> for a <st data-num="04437" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="01005" class="">residence</st><n id="1" /> by my own <st data-num="08632" class="">mighty</st> <st data-num="02632" class="">strength</st><n id="2" /> and for my <st data-num="01923" class="">majestic</st> <st data-num="03367" class="">honor</st>?”

<st data-num="05751" class="">While</st> these <st data-num="04406" class="">words</st> were still on the <st data-num="04430" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="06433" class="">lips</st>,<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="07032" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="05308" class="">came down</st> <st data-num="04481" class="">from</st> <st data-num="08065" class="">heaven</st>: “It is hereby <st data-num="0560" class="">announced</st> to you,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="04430" class="">King</st> <st data-num="05020" class="">Nebuchadnezzar</st>, that your <st data-num="04437" class="">kingdom</st> has been <st data-num="05709" class="">removed</st> <st data-num="04481" class="">from</st> you!

You will be driven from human society, and you will live with the wild animals. You will be fed grass like oxen, and seven periods of time will pass by for you before you understand that the Most High is ruler over human kingdoms and gives them to whomever he wishes.”

Now in that very moment this pronouncement about Nebuchadnezzar came true. He was driven from human society, he ate grass like oxen, and his body became damp with the dew of the sky, until his hair became long like an eagle’s feathers and his nails like a bird’s claws.

But at the end of the appointed time I, Nebuchadnezzar, looked up toward heaven, and my sanity returned to me.

I extolled the Most High,

and I praised and glorified the one who lives forever.

For his authority is an everlasting authority,

and his kingdom extends from one generation to the next.

All the inhabitants of the earth are regarded as nothing.

He does as he wishes with the army of heaven

and with those who inhabit the earth.

No one slaps his hand

and says to him, “What have you done?”

At that time my sanity returned to me. I was restored to the honor of my kingdom, and my splendor returned to me. My ministers and my nobles were seeking me out, and I was reinstated over my kingdom. I became even greater than before.
Now I, Nebuchadnezzar, praise and exalt and glorify the King of heaven, for all his deeds are right and his ways are just. He is able to bring down those who live in pride.
